text: Allahu Nuru As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Mathalu Nurihi Kamishkaatin Fiha Misbahun Al-Misbahu Fi Zujajatin Az-Zujajatu Ka'annaha Kawkabun Durriyun Yuqadu Min Shajaratin Mubarakatin Zaytunatin La Sharqiyatin Wa La Gharbiyatin Yakadu Zaytuha Yuđi'u Wa Law Lam Tamsas/hu Narun Nurun `Ala Nurin Yahdi Allahu Linurihi Man Yasha'u Wa Yađribu Allahu Al-'Amthala Lilnnasi Wa Allahu Bikulli Shay'in `Alimun
